name: Starship Workshop
desc: Private starship production and refit workshops. Production is constrained by gravitational conditions of a planet.

name: Oasis Towers
desc: Huge enclosed towers made out of the local rock and sealed against the oppressive heat of the surrounding %s, protecting hundreds of people from the harsh environment outside.

name: Orbital Station - Salvaged
desc:
A salvaged space station, featuring medium firepower and moderate armor.

Must be reduced before invasions or bombardment can be attempted.

name: Orbital Station - Salvaged
desc:
A salvaged space defense station, featuring medium firepower, missile support, heavy armor and a considerable fighter garrison.

Must be reduced before invasions or bombardment can be attempted.

name: Star Fortress - Midline
desc:
An up-armored battlestation, featuring a large complement of fighters and an extensive minefield.

Must be reduced before invasions or bombardment can be attempted.

name: Airbase
desc: Facilities for loading and unloading cargo and performing basic aircraft repairs. Not exactly a spaceport but better than none.
